name: Bedtime Story (Tea Party Studios)
description:
Known Bugs (!)

-You have to finish dialogues for quests to appear, otherwise, you might not able to proceed next area.

You can restart the game, skip dialogue with mouse clicks and then let quest to appear so you can clear the quest.

-The last area is the 3 enemies you kill on narrow passage, currently thats all.

The "Idea"

Bedtime Story is offering story-based and platformer-crafted gameplay. Explore the little girl's imagination and make sure you are in bed before your mom finds out that you haven't slept yet.

Controls

A & D or Arrow Left & Right - Move
W or Arrow Up - Jump
LMB - Attack

You can skip to the next dialogue by clicking on them (or enable auto mode on the bottom right corner).

Stuck? Restart The Game! In case you didn't know, there is a little save system that saves your progress in certain areas. Tea Party Studio - Made With

Mustafa Gültekin (a.k.a Matsuo#3381) - Programmer [Tea Party Studios - itch.io]

Mesut Yılmaz (a.k.a PHX#0145) - Artist 

Ozan Koç (a.k.a Ozai#7915) - Animator [Ozimanci - itch.io]

Credits

- Music and Sound by WOW Sound, https://wowsound.com/
